entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h except gusting to 50 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 15 April 2023
